proposal: Hey TxWorx community! Noticed you're all about empowering Degens, LP providers, and Project leaders with modern tools. We're here to complement that vision with our suite, including a DEX you can spin up and a Lottery system that's all about sharing the revenue. Congrats on rallying 487 holders on the ETH network! Let's build together and make the ecosystem even richer. How about we add some of our tools to your toolbox? 🛠🔄🎰
